resampler module¶

Resampler for the preprocessing script

What this script will do when finished:

Get src and dest directories

make a memory-mapped version

resampler.resample(slicegen, scale, nrrd_path)[source]¶
Parameters:
  • array – numpy-like array - accepts np.memmap objects and h5py array objects
  • scale – scale factor. Should be < 1 for downscaling
  • outfile – outfile NRRD containing extension
Raises:

Make sure to add some error handling
